name: Athens 2004
description: Athens 2004 captures the spirit of the Olympic Games and provides the most detailed and comprehensive Olympic licensed video game to date. You compete in 3 game modes: Practice, Arcade and Competition. Choose from 64 countries, 5 continents and 800 different athletes/characters and go for gold in Track and Field, Swimming, Gymnastics, Shooting, Weightlifting or Equestrian.
